executiveSummary: Entrepreneur Ali Kinney from New York City pitched her company, Modern Picnic, seeking $400,000 for 6.5% equity. The brand offers fashionable, insulated vegan leather lunch boxes designed to replace outdated and unstylish options. Despite strong sales of nearly $6 million since 2018 and partnerships with Saks, The Container Store, and Bloomingdaleâ€™s, all sharks declined to invest due to high marketing expenses and a lack of profitability.
nextSteps: Ali will likely focus on improving profitability by reducing marketing expenses and optimizing customer acquisition costs before pursuing future funding opportunities.
